message.content:
cs.ET, cs.NE, cs.EL, cs.AR, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
- cs.ET (Emerging Technologies): The paper proposes a new implementation of a fundamental module of the neuro-fuzzy system using memristive crossbar arrays, which can be considered an emerging technology in the field of electronic hardware. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The proposed implementation is based on a neuro-fuzzy system, which is a type of artificial neural network. 
- cs.EL (Electronics): The paper proposes an analog electronic hardware implementation of the membership function of a neuro-fuzzy system. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper proposes a specific architecture (memristive crossbar arrays) for the implementation of the membership function. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The proposed implementation is related to decision-making and control systems, which are topics within the scope of this sub-category.
